idioms.reading: のうあるたかはつめをかくす
idioms.meaning: a wise man keeps some of his talents in reserve

idioms.reading: きをかくすならもりのなか
idioms.meaning: if you want to hide a tree, the best place is a forest

idioms.word: 木の葉を隠すなら森の中
idioms.reading: このはをかくすならもりのなか
idioms.meaning: if you want to hide a leaf, the best place is a forest
